<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><P>Malice:</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The blow to the face was nothing to him as the soft tissue was quick to repair.  His free hand was fast to clamp onto Myrmidon's wrist and wrench it at what he hoped was a painful and damaging injury.  his other hand reached back and drew his katanna and spun it around and plunged it down toward Myrmidon.  He released his tail from the cieling to drop down and evade the fire for a moment, but he was sure now there would be lasting damage.</P>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"><BR><BR>
